events.message: I received the wrong product and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because I am very disappointed.
The issue has been classified under the refund category due to the customer's request for money back.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the customer's refund request for the incorrect product.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request for the wrong item delivered.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the product you received so I can verify and process your refund?
Sure, my order number is 987654321. I have also attached a photo showing the product I received instead of what I ordered.
Thank you for the information. I have approved your refund, and you should see the amount credited back to your payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and approval. I appreciate the help resolving this issue so smoothly.
The refund case has been marked as resolved since the customer has acknowledged the solution and expressed satisfaction.
Dear customer, we are following up to confirm that you have received your refund and everything is now in order.
Since the refund was successfully processed and confirmed, this case is now officially closed. Thank you for contacting support.
